org.apache.hadoop.mapred
Class FileHandle

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileHandle

public class FileHandle
extends java.lang.Object

Manipulate the working area for the transient store for maps and reduces.

getInputSpillFileForWrite

public Path getInputSpillFileForWrite(TaskAttemptID attempt,
                                      TaskID task,
                                      int spillNumber,
                                      long size)
                               throws java.io.IOException
Used by JBufferSink when accepting new input data that needs to be spilled to disk.

Parameters:
attempt - The taskid that owns the sink.
task - The taskid that is sending the data.
spillNumber - The spill number
size - The size of the spill file.
Returns:
A path to the spill file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
